text:
eSpark Learning | Full Time | San Francisco | Onsite

http://esparklearning.com

We transform student learning to help students succeed in school and in life. We are the only major edtech startup that has the magnitude of proven results - 1.6x to 1.9x expected growth targets. Check out the data here: http://www.esparklearning.com/data-results/

We have a Rails stack, including Angular/React within a hybrid native app and a number of micro services on the backend. I'm looking for 1 or 2 Senior Engineers to join the team and make a significant difference.

Email me luke@esparklearning.com if you'd like to learn more.
